alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 10:18PM PST until December 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts of 60 to 80 mph expected. The strongest winds will be on exposed beaches and headlands. The timing of the strongest winds will between now and Noon Tuesday. Winds will become westerly in the afternoon, and gradually ease Tuesday evening. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees. Scattered power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
